**Base Material** [Sovereign Steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=776)

</column>

---

Sovereign steel weapons are treated as [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) against creatures with a weakness to cold iron, like [demons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28) and [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69). In addition, the [noqual](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1419) in sovereign steel weapons disrupts spellcasters' concentration, causing them to become [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round on a critical hit.
